courses.title: Mathematics (Core)
courses.prerequisite: MATH 1314 or MATH 1414: College Ready TSI status in Mathematics. MATH 2412: MATH 1314 or MATH 1414 with a grade of 'C' or better; or passing the College Algebra Exemption Test administered by the Department of Mathematics. MATH 2413: MATH 2412 with a grade of 'C' or better; or passing the Precalculus Exemption Test administered by the Department of Mathematics.
